theChemist:CURSED_GAZE.NAME: Cursed Gaze
DESCRIPTIONS: A random enemy loses #b6 #yStrength this turn.

theChemist:DRAGONS_CURSE.NAME: Dragon's Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b5 damage and inflict #b1 #yImbalance on a random enemy.

theChemist:DRAGONS_FEAST.NAME: Dragon's Feast
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b5 damage to a random enemy. Gain life equal to unblocked damage dealt.

theChemist:DRAGONS_RAGE.NAME: Dragon's Rage
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b10 damage to a random enemy.

theChemist:DRAGONS_SCALES.NAME: Dragon's Scales
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b4 #yBlock. Deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.

theChemist:DUD.NAME: Dud
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. Deal #b3 damage to yourself.

theChemist:GALVANIZING_AGENT.NAME: Galvanizing Agent
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [R].

theChemist:RESURRECTION.NAME: Resurrection
DESCRIPTIONS: Return all #yExhausted playable cards to the draw pile.

theChemist:STORMS_EYE.NAME: Storm's Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b4 #yBlock for each enemy in combat.
